p: Total phenols content was increased with the application of AA and Chitosan+AA on the second day as presented in Figure 6A. On the fourth day, EO+AA and Chitosan+AA increased phenolics and similarly EO+AA, Chitosan+AA, and chlorine resulted to higher phenolic content (1.19, 0.96, and 0.92 g kg âˆ’1 GAE, respectively) at the end of storage.
